translation: The foods that increase life, purity, strength, health, joy, and cheerfulness (good appetite), which are savory, oily, substantial, and agreeable, are dear to the Sattvic (pure) people.
commentary: 17.8 Ayuḥsattvabalarogyasukhapreetivivardhanaḥ those which increase Ayus (life)? Sattva (purity)? Read (strength)? Health (health)? Sukha (joy)? Pretty (cheerfulness and good appetite)? Rasyaḥ savoury? Greasy: oleaginous? Stable: substantial? agreeable to the heart? Foods the foods? Sattvikapriyāḥ are dear to Sattvic (pure).Commentary Pure food increases the vitality and strength of those who eat it. It
